trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class is an exception that occurs when the server returns an <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> è un'eccezione che si verifica quando il server restituisce un <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> object returned by the server that corresponds to the <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> restituito dal server che corrisponde a <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class using the specified response object.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> utilizzando l'oggetto risposta specificato.

trans-unit.source: The default message displayed to the client is "<errorResponse> returned".
trans-unit.target: Il messaggio predefinito visualizzato nel client è "È stato restituito <errorResponse>".

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio visualizzato nel client quando viene generata l'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class using the specified message.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.String)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> utilizzando il messaggio specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> object returned by the server that corresponds to the <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> restituito dal server che corrisponde a <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio visualizzato nel client quando viene generata l'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse,System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class using the specified response object and message.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse,System.String)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> utilizzando l'oggetto risposta e il messaggio specificati.

trans-unit.source: Data required to serialize the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Dati necessari per serializzare il parametro.

trans-unit.source: The source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the parameter.
trans-unit.target: L'origine e la destinazione del flusso serializzato associato al parametro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class using the specified serialization data and streaming context.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> utilizzando i dati di serializzazione e il contesto di flusso specificati.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio visualizzato nel client quando viene generata l'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" />, if any, that threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: Eventuale proprietà <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> che ha generato l'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class using the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> utilizzando il messaggio e l'eccezione interna specificati.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> object returned by the server that corresponds to the <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> restituito dal server che corrisponde a <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio visualizzato nel client quando viene generata l'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" />, if any, that threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: Eventuale proprietà <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> che ha generato l'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse,System.String,System.Exception)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> class using the specified response object, message, and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse,System.String,System.Exception)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException" /> utilizzando l'oggetto risposta, il messaggio e l'eccezione interna specificati.

trans-unit.source: Data required to serialize the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Dati necessari per serializzare il parametro.

trans-unit.source: The source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the parameter.
trans-unit.target: L'origine e la destinazione del flusso serializzato associato al parametro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> method populates the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object with the data required to serialize the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> popola l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> con i dati necessari per serializzare il parametro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.Response" /> property contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> object that corresponds to the <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseException.Response" /> contiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> che corrisponde a <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> object that corresponds to the <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorResponse" /> che corrisponde a <see langword="<errorResponse>" />.
